name: Pixelium Planoid Shooter
description:
'Pixelium Planoid Shooter' is a vertical scrolling shoot-em-up bullet hell old school arcade style game with loads of fun.

Boom the space with you're fighter plane while you battle with different enemies. Lots of bosses and their followers to battle with.

Features:-

1. Many boss battles.

2. Lots of other NPCs to battle, with different bullet attack styles.

3. Powers ups, One ups and Health portion available in space.

4. Get bonus by killing enemies.

Genre: Windows
